```{r}
4.8,5.4,5.2,5.5,4.9,5.0,5.5,4.9,4.4,5.1,
5.0,4.5,4.4,5.0,5.1,4.8,5.1,4.6,5.3,5.0)
versicolor = c(7.0,6.4,6.9,5.5,6.5,5.7,6.3,4.9,6.6,5.2,
5.0,5.9,6.0,6.1,5.6,6.7,5.6,5.8,6.2,5.6,
5.9,6.1,6.3,6.1,6.4,6.6,6.8,6.7,6.0,5.7,
5.5,5.5,5.8,6.0,5.4,6.0,6.7,6.3,5.6,5.5,
5.5,6.1,5.8,5.0,5.6,5.7,5.7,6.2,5.1,5.7)
virginica = c(6.3,5.8,7.1,6.3,6.5,7.6,4.9,7.3,6.7,7.2,
6.5,6.4,6.8,5.7,5.8,6.4,6.5,7.7,7.7,6.0,
6.9,5.6,7.7,6.3,6.7,7.2,6.2,6.1,6.4,7.2,
7.4,7.9,6.4,6.3,6.1,7.7,6.3,6.4,6.0,6.9,
6.7,6.9,5.8,6.8,6.7,6.7,6.3,6.5,6.2,5.9)

flower.lengths = c(setosa, versicolor, virginica)

setosa.labels = rep(x = "setosa", times = length(setosa))
versicolor.labels = rep(x = "versicolor", times = length(versicolor))
virginica.labels = rep(x = "virginica", times = length(virginica))
flower.labels = c(setosa.labels, versicolor.labels, virginica.labels)

flower.species = factor(flower.labels)

stripchart(flower.lengths ~ flower.species, vertical = TRUE)

tapply(X = flower.lengths, INDEX = flower.species, FUN = mean)
tapply(X = flower.lengths, INDEX = flower.species, FUN = sd)
```

## Q7
```{r}
qqnorm(flower.lengths)
```

## Q8
```{r}
flower.model = aov(flower.lengths ~ flower.species)
anova(flower.model)
plot(residuals(flower.model) ~ fitted(flower.model), ylab = "Residuals", xlab = "Fitted Values", main = "Residuals vs Fitted Values")
```

## Q11
```{r}
CIs = TukeyHSD(flower.model, conf.level = 0.95)
CIs
plot(CIs)
```
